name: Tasty! Birthday Ice Cream Bars - Kids Cake Ice Cooking Games FREE Food Maker!
name_original: Tasty! Birthday Ice Cream Bars - Kids Cake Ice Cooking Games FREE Food Maker!
description:
Create your own favourite Ice Slushy in this summer with new Ice Slush Maker

Pretty chill! Just think of all the cool combinations you can make for all the kids in their shorts and sandals!

Next, add crazy straws with loops that make drinking slushies even more fun! Then choose your favourite cool colors and toppings to add the perfect Tasty! Birthday Ice Cream Bars finishing touch!
